performanceLevels.description: Resists change and struggles to adapt to new situations. Exhibits inflexibility and is resistant to feedback.
Adapts to new situations effectively. Is open to feedback and demonstrates willingness to learn and grow through problem solving skills and adaptability.
Demonstrates outstanding adaptability to new situations and challenges. Embraces feedback and seeks opportunities for growth. Thrives and inspires others to adapt to new projects or situations.
